titles.title: A bill to reduce the rates of the occupational taxes on retail dealers in liquor and retail dealers in beer to the rates in effect before the Revenue Act of 1987.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/5/1988--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the occupational tax: (1) from $250 to $54 for retail dealers in liquors; and (2) from $250 to $24 for retail dealers in beer.
